entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
